issue.title: [CF 1639] RBG Enemies in stealth
issue.body:
Is there a way to track the number of enemies in stealth? Right now i have to spam click frames to know for sure, but it would be nice to have a little icon show me while im guarding a base to know if they are going to try to ninja. arena1-10 doesnt seem to work for bg's and maybe a condition like (unit=exists) would work if they went into stealth?


> Posted by CurseForge user Talason84891 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1639 | Raw

comments.body:
There are no unitIDs for enemies in battlegrounds, save for the enemy flag carrier (which will be one of the arena units)

 

What you're asking for can't be done.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
